title: Assessing the undesired impacts on water sustainability from climate change mitigation technologies in fossil-based power generation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00122B, Paper
Prebantha Moodley, Kevin Harding, Thomas A. Adams
In the absence of water quality and water scarcity data, WICa provides meaningful results between carbon mitigation technologies. It is useful as a technology decision making tool, validated here by 6 technologies in fossil-based power generation.
